br.octahedron.cotopaxi.controller
Class ControllerExecutor

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.cotopaxi.controller.ControllerExecutor

public class ControllerExecutor
extends Object

This class is responsible by the controllers' execution and by gets the ControllerResponse for each request. It also is responsible by handles all the ControllerContext lifecycle.

Author:
Danilo Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

Method Detail

execute

public ControllerResponse execute(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                  NotFoundExeption nfex)
Handles a controller NotFoundExeption. It's responsible to generate a response once a controller has not be found.

Returns:
A ControllerResponse for the given HttpServletRequest / NotFoundExeption

execute

public ControllerResponse execute(ControllerDescriptor controllerDesc,
                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Executes the given controller

Parameters:
controllerDesc - The controller descriptor
request - The current request
Returns:
The ControllerResponse for the given controller
